Posts.Content: ReneeG wrote: So last night I had a mammogram and there was a good sized white spot and white spidering.  She took two films of my left and about 6 of the side with the white spot, which was clearly something.  I am sick to my stomach waiting for a call.  My last mam was 2012.  My cousin had stage 4 BC and survived thus far, it has been 4 years.  Any thoughts?  I am trying to chill, but I want to hear from someone like right now.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Pea Sized white spot with spidering ??? ReneeG dodge1616
